column3: Removed 431 duplicate rows based on product_url and title.
Deleted rows where title was missing.
column5: Product Identification: Essential for identifying specific high-performing items and analyzing keyword trends in product names.

column3: Extracted first 3 chars. Converted valid ratings to numbers.
column4: Filled with "NOT RATED". Explicitly labeled missing data.
column5: Customer Satisfaction Metric: Key indicator of product quality. Used to correlate customer sentiment with sales volume (Do higher ratings = higher sales?).

column4: Filled with 0. Assumption: Null implies zero reviews exist.
column5: Social Proof & Trust: Represents the "popularity" and "age" of a product. High review counts often drive higher conversion rates.

column4: Filled with 0. Assumption: Missing sales data implies negligible sales.
column5: Volume Metric: The primary measure of demand. Used to identify "Best Sellers" vs. "Slow Movers."

column3: Consolidated 3 price columns into one master column using Waterfall logic.
column4: Filled with "N/A". Left as text to avoid pricing errors.
column5: Revenue Driver: Critical for calculating Total Revenue. Also used to analyze "Price Elasticity" (Does lowering the price increase sales?).

column4: Calculated. Logic: If Price is "N/A" or Sales is 0, Revenue = $0.00.
column5: North Star Metric: The ultimate measure of business success. Focuses analysis on value rather than just volume.

column4: Filled with "No Badge". Created a clean category for comparison.
column5: Trust Signal: innovative "Badge" that influences buyer psychology. We analyze if this badge actually boosts sales.

column4: Filled with 0. Assumption: Missing tag implies Organic.
column5: Marketing Efficiency: differentiating "Paid" vs. "Organic" traffic. helps determine if ad spend is generating a return on investment (ROI).

column3: Converted to Binary Flag (1=Has Coupon, 0=No Coupon).
column4: Filled with 0. Assumption: Missing tag implies No Coupon.
column5: Promotion Strategy: Measures the impact of discounts on conversion. (Do coupons cannibalize revenue or boost volume?).

column3: Created Binary Flag based on "Add to Cart" value. Deleted original column.
column4: Filled with 0. Assumption: Missing button implies Out of Stock.
column5: Supply Chain Health: A critical operational metric. Out-of-stock items represent lost revenue opportunities.

column3: Created Binary Flag based on "FREE" keyword. Deleted original column.
column4: Filled with 0. Assumption: Missing text implies paid shipping.
column5: Logistics Strategy: A major conversion driver. We analyze if free shipping encourages customers to buy more.

column3: Deleted Column. High null rate (92%) and mixed values created noise.
Deleted Columns. Irrelevant for statistical analysis.
